original_text: Now Sheshan had no sons, but daughters. And Sheshan had a servant, an Egyptian, whose name was Jarha.
korean_text: 세산은 아들이 없고 딸뿐이라 그에게 야르하라 하는 애굽 종이 있으므로

sentences.original_text: Now Sheshan had no sons, but daughters.
sentences.korean_translation: 이제 세산은 아들이 없었고, 딸들만 있었습니다.

sentences.original_text: And Sheshan had a servant, an Egyptian,
